text: Béatrice Patrie (born 12 May 1957 in Lorient) is a French former judge and Member of the European Parliament for the South West of France. She is a member of the Socialist Party, part of the Party of European Socialists. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Socialist Party (France) MEPs Category:MEPs for France 1999–2004 Category:MEPs for South-West France 2004–2009 Category:20th-century women MEPs for France Category:21st-century women MEPs for France
title: Béatrice Patrie
